summary.overview: This batch job executes a COBOL program to perform database maintenance operations on transaction records. It processes input data through the CARDDEMO application to update business records in the DB2 database system.
business_functions: Read transaction records from input file
Connect to DB2 database system for data access
Update business records in the database
Generate processing status and completion messages

datasource_summary.name: DB2 Exit Routines Library (OEM.DB2.DAZ1.SDSNEXIT)
datasource_summary.function: Contains DB2 exit routines required for program execution support

datasource_summary.name: DB2 Load Modules Library (OEMA.DB2.VERSIONA.SDSNLOAD)
datasource_summary.function: Contains DB2 load modules required for program execution support

datasource_summary.name: Application Load Modules Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.LOADLIB)
datasource_summary.function: Contains application load modules required for program execution support

datasource_summary.name: Database Request Modules Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.DBRMLIB)
datasource_summary.function: Contains database request modules used for DB2 program binding operations

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Input File (INPFILE)
datasource_summary.function: Contains transaction records to be processed by the COBOL program

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Record File (TR-RECORD)
datasource_summary.function: Transaction record file processed for database update operations

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
    COBTUPDT["Updates transaction database records (COBTUPDT) "]
